file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 77-21-00-06 - ENGINE THERMOCOUPLE HARNESS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ENGINE THERMOCOUPLE HARNESS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to inspect the engine thermocouple harness. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ENGINE THERMOCOUPLE HARNESS - ALL 77-21-00-200-801-A INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 77-21-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 77-21-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE THERMOCOUPLE HARNESS - INSPECTION A. General (1) To inspect the engine thermocouple harness, obey the instructions in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400 NACELLE APRON - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400 APRON - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH engine 425 RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work Stand To give access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the work stand in the work area. (2) Remove the related components: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 77-21-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400). J. Engine Thermocouple Harness - GVI SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Visually inspect the engine thermocouple harness. Refer to the last revision of Rolls- Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the work stand from work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 77-21-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
